category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAssignmentStateInitial
preference.preference_description: Specifies the initial value given to the assignment state of resolved assigned occurrence objects during the Resolve Logical Part Assignments operation in enterprise bill of process (EBOP) structures in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: Accepts one of the following values: No State Pending Accepted Rejected
